=====================================

### Kitchen Cleaning Services for the CN Tower

#### procurement information

* **Solicitation Number** : CNT-2023P05
* **Reference Number**: cb-834-94148250 
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal ( Demande de propositions)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner )
* **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)  
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Febuary 01, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: January 31, 2027
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Toronto ( Toronto)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Toronto (Toronto)

#### tender description

We are seeking proposals for the provision of kitchen cleaning services for the CN Tower. The proposed services must comply with all applicable codes, regulations and industry standards. The successful bidder will be expected to provide evidence of quality service, thoroughness, attention to detail and demonstrate a high level of customer service.

#### scope of work

The proposed services include:

* Daily, weekly and semi-weekly cleaning of the kitchen facilities on the Service Level, Le Café Production Kitchen, Main Observation Level (Level 3) and the Restaurant Level (Level 4)
* Cleaning and sanitizing of all food preparation and cooking surfaces, utensils and equipment
* Cleaning and sanitizing of refrigerators, freezers, food storage areas and other areas of the kitchen
* Proper removal and disposal of all food waste, recyclables and other items

#### requirements

The winning bidder will be required to provide the necessary qualifications, experience, and capabilities to deliver the services in a timely and satisfactory manner. A detailed statement outlining their approach, methodology, and any references to previous related work completed will be part of the proposal submission.
